statements: SELECT * FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE demand_forecast > 1000;
SELECT product_name, seasonal_trend FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE seasonal_trend = 'High';
SELECT product_id, demand_forecast FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE product_name LIKE 'Product%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_forecast FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE demand_forecast > 100 ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC
SELECT * FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_forecast, seasonal_trend FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE seasonal_trend = 'Winter' ORDER BY demand_forecast ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_forecast, seasonal_trend FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE seasonal_trend IN ('Spring', 'Summer') ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_forecast, seasonal_trend FROM SeasonalDemandPredictions WHERE demand_forecast BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM seasonal_trends
SELECT id, sales_amount FROM seasonal_trends ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, sales_amount FROM seasonal_trends WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions WHERE predicted_demand >= 500 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT date, predicted_demand FROM demand_predictions
SELECT date, sales_amount FROM seasonal_trends WHERE date = '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, predicted_demand FROM demand_predictions ORDER BY predicted_demand DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM seasonal_trends WHERE seasonal_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM seasonal_trends GROUP BY date HAVING date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM seasonal_trends GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM SeasonalTrends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE trend_end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM SeasonalTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE trend_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trend_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'Summer%' ORDER BY trend_start_date DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand, confidence_level FROM DemandPredictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM SeasonalTrends INNER JOIN DemandPredictions ON SeasonalTrends.trend_id = DemandPredictions.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE trend_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_trends WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, season FROM seasonal_trends WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT product_id, trend_type FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, product_id, prediction_date, predicted_demand FROM demand_prediction WHERE prediction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_trends ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, demand, season FROM seasonal_trends WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand, season FROM seasonal_trends WHERE season = 'Summer' AND demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT analysis_date, trend_type FROM trend_analysis INNER JOIN seasonal_trends ON trend_analysis.product_id = seasonal_trends.product_id ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT product_name AS Product, sale_date AS Date, sale_quantity AS Quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity > 50 ORDER BY sale_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM seasonal_products WHERE season = 'Spring';
SELECT product_name, price, season FROM seasonal_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_name, price, season FROM seasonal_products JOIN predictions ON seasonal_products.product_id = predictions.product_id WHERE predictions.demand_estimate > 100 ORDER BY price ASC, season DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT s.product_id, s.sale_date, s.quantity, p.demand_estimate FROM sales_data s JOIN predictions p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10 AND p.demand_estimate < 50 ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC, p.demand_estimate ASC;
SELECT st.season, st.trend_description FROM seasonal_trends st WHERE st.season IN ('Winter', 'Spring') ORDER BY st.trend_id DESC LIMIT 10;
